name: Tripeaks Solitaire: Kingdom
description:
"Tripeaks Solitaire: Kingdom" brings you the classic Solitaire style of fun.
If you love classic solitaire games, you're going to love the Tripeaks Solitaire: Kingdom!
Don't miss out on Solitaire for your phone and tablet!

Download and Play - Tripeaks Solitaire: Kingdom NOW!

FEATURES:
• The classic Tripeaks Solitaire experience
• Various card faces, backs and table backgrounds
• Availability for both tablets and mobile phones
• Daily challenges
• Simple and clean layout
• Portrait or landscape view

NOTES:
• This app contains interstitial ads.

Contact us if you have any questions, ideas for improvements or experience any bugs when playing the game: help@bitmango.com

Your feedback will be considered for our future updates.
